tasks.title: Setup Project Repository and Dependencies
tasks.description: Prepare the project environment by ensuring all required dependencies are installed and configured, including browser-image-compression and Shopify file upload system.
tasks.details: Install browser-image-compression (latest stable, e.g., 1.0.12), ensure Node.js (LTS), and TypeScript are up to date. Configure project to use existing media.ts infrastructure and Shopify file upload system. Set up environment variables for Shopify API keys and endpoints. Use npm or yarn for dependency management.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all dependencies are installed and environment variables are set. Test basic project build and run.

subtasks.title: Initialize Project Repository
subtasks.description: Set up a new or existing project repository for the Weaverse builder, ensuring version control is enabled.
subtasks.details: Create or clone the project repository, initialize Git, and set up the basic project structure if not already present.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that the repository is accessible, Git is initialized, and the project structure is in place.

subtasks.title: Update and Install Core Dependencies
subtasks.description: Ensure Node.js (LTS), TypeScript, and package managers (npm or yarn) are up to date. Install browser-image-compression (latest stable version).
subtasks.details: Check and update Node.js and TypeScript versions. Use npm or yarn to install browser-image-compression (e.g., version 1.0.12 or latest stable).
subtasks.testStrategy: Run 'node -v', 'tsc -v', and 'npm list browser-image-compression' to confirm correct versions are installed.

subtasks.title: Configure Environment Variables for Shopify Integration
subtasks.description: Set up environment variables for Shopify API keys and endpoints required for the file upload system.
subtasks.details: Add necessary environment variables (e.g., SHOPIFY_API_KEY, SHOPIFY_API_SECRET, SHOPIFY_ENDPOINT) to the project's .env file or environment configuration.
subtasks.testStrategy: Check that environment variables are loaded correctly by logging them in a development build (without exposing secrets).

subtasks.title: Integrate browser-image-compression with media.ts Infrastructure
subtasks.description: Modify or extend the existing media.ts module to utilize browser-image-compression for image processing before upload.
subtasks.details: Import browser-image-compression in media.ts, implement image compression logic using async/await or Promise syntax, and ensure compatibility with the current file handling workflow.
subtasks.testStrategy: Write unit tests or manual tests to verify that images are compressed as expected before upload.

subtasks.title: Connect and Test Shopify File Upload System
subtasks.description: Ensure the compressed images from media.ts are correctly uploaded to Shopify using the configured API and endpoints.
subtasks.details: Implement or verify the upload logic to Shopify, making sure it uses the compressed image output and handles responses and errors appropriately.
subtasks.testStrategy: Perform end-to-end tests by uploading sample images and confirming successful uploads in the Shopify admin or via API responses.

tasks.title: Remove Legacy Upload Endpoint and Route
tasks.description: Remove the old `/api/upload-image` endpoint and route to prevent future usage and ensure backward compatibility.
tasks.details: Delete builder/app/routes/api/upload-image.ts and remove the corresponding route from builder/app/routes.ts. Ensure no references to the old endpoint remain in the codebase.
tasks.testStrategy: Test that the old endpoint is no longer accessible and that all references are removed. Check for any breaking changes in the chat interface.

tasks.title: Update UploadImage Component to Use media.ts Endpoints
tasks.description: Refactor the UploadImage component to use the new media.ts endpoints for image uploads.
tasks.details: Modify builder/app/modules/chatbot/upload-image.tsx to use `/api/media/staged-links` and `/api/media/upload-files` endpoints. Implement file selection and upload logic using the new endpoints. Ensure proper TypeScript typing from ~/types/media.
tasks.testStrategy: Test file selection, upload initiation, and response handling. Verify that the component works with the new endpoints and maintains backward compatibility.

tasks.title: Implement Image Compression and Validation
tasks.description: Add image compression and file validation to the upload process.
tasks.details: Integrate browser-image-compression (v1.0.12) to compress images before upload (max 2MB, max dimension 1024px). Implement file type and size validation. Use async/await for compression and validation steps.
tasks.testStrategy: Test with various image types and sizes. Verify compression and validation logic, including error handling for invalid files.

tasks.title: Add Loading States and Error Handling
tasks.description: Implement loading states and robust error handling for the upload process.
tasks.details: Update builder/app/modules/chatbot/input-area.tsx to manage upload state (loading, success, error). Display user feedback during uploads. Handle errors from compression, validation, and Shopify uploads.
tasks.testStrategy: Test upload states and error messages. Simulate network errors and invalid files to ensure graceful handling.

tasks.title: Integrate Staged Upload and Shopify File Creation
tasks.description: Implement the staged upload process and async Shopify file record creation.
tasks.details: Use `/api/media/staged-links` to get upload URLs. Upload compressed files to staged links. Use `/api/media/upload-files` to finalize and create Shopify file records asynchronously. Ensure non-blocking UI during uploads.
tasks.testStrategy: Test staged upload flow and async file creation. Verify that Shopify file records are created and accessible via CDN.

tasks.title: Optimize Upload Performance and User Feedback
tasks.description: Optimize the upload process for chat performance and provide clear user feedback.
tasks.details: Implement progress indicators for uploads. Optimize chunking and parallel uploads if needed. Ensure user feedback is clear and timely. Leverage Shopify CDN for fast delivery.
tasks.testStrategy: Test upload performance with large files. Verify progress indicators and user feedback. Check CDN delivery speed.

tasks.title: Final Testing and Backward Compatibility Check
tasks.description: Perform comprehensive testing and ensure backward compatibility with the chat interface.
tasks.details: Test all upload scenarios (success, error, cancellation). Verify that no breaking changes are introduced to the chat interface. Ensure all error messages are user-friendly and actionable.
tasks.testStrategy: End-to-end testing of the upload flow. Regression testing of chat interface. User acceptance testing for feedback clarity.

tasks.title: Implement Two-Stage AI Model Workflow for Code Generation
tasks.description: Implement an intelligent code generation workflow using Vercel v0 model for initial code generation from image/text prompts, with conditional refinement to meet Weaverse standards.
tasks.details:
1. Implement AI Developer Mode decision logic in `handleDeveloperWorkflow()`:
   - Trigger developer mode for image upload + "create section" or text-only prompts
   - Select appropriate tools for code generation

2. Integrate Vercel v0 model:
   - Create new tool to generate initial code using Vercel v0 model
   - Accept both image links and text prompts as input

3. Implement code quality assessment:
   - Evaluate Vercel v0 output against Weaverse standards
   - Return directly if quality meets standards
   - Refine code to meet standards when quality is insufficient

4. Remove legacy components:
   - Eliminate TwoStageWorkflowOrchestrator and related orchestration
   - Remove UI settings/toggles for old two-stage feature
   - Delete twoStageSettings from API schema

5. Streamline user experience:
   - Auto-trigger workflow on image upload + "create section"
   - Use single progress indicator

6. Error handling:
   - Implement fallback for Vercel v0 failures
   - Maintain robust API error handling
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Core Functionality Testing:
   - Verify image/text prompts trigger Vercel v0 workflow
   - Test quality assessment: direct return vs refinement paths
   - Validate output meets Weaverse component structure and Tailwind v4

2. Integration Testing:
   - Test Vercel v0 API integration with image/text inputs
   - Verify removal of twoStageSettings and related UI

3. Quality Assessment Testing:
   - Validate quality checks against Weaverse standards
   - Test refinement process with substandard inputs

4. Performance Testing:
   - Measure Vercel v0 response times
   - Compare refined vs direct output performance

5. Edge Case Testing:
   - Test corrupted/invalid images
   - Verify behavior during Vercel v0 API outages
   - Test ambiguous text prompts

6. Regression Testing:
   - Ensure non-image workflows remain functional
   - Confirm legacy component removal doesn't break features
